The Tiger leaves the area of the pod and roams forth.  It can smell 
the scent of a wolf and it looks about.  It lets out a low growl and 
slowly walks on.  It follows the scent trail left by the wolf.  the 
tiger knows it's getting closer to it's prey because the scent trail 
is getting strong.  It uses stealth and cunning to follow it's next 
meal.  It moves through the trees without a sound.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> The wolf smells the air, something was coming his way, something 
big and
> organic. Lunarpine kept moving forward he was safe unless it was 
hungry.
>
